code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skills=["Python, C/C++, Java, JavaScript, C#, Bash, Linux, HTML/CSS","AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitHub Pages","FastAPI, Flask, ReactJS, Node.js, Django","Operating Systems, Memory Management, Debugging, Networking, Hardware Integration","PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, OpenAI, LangChain, Vertex, Bedrock","GDB, Tableau, Telemetry Logs, VS Code, Jira, Git"];function Skills(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"skills",className:"min-h-screen flex flex-col justify-center items-center bg-pink-50 py-20 px-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl w-full bg-pink-200 bg-opacity-90 rounded-3xl shadow-lg p-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-extrabold mb-8 text-center text-black",children:"Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 list-disc list-inside text-black text-lg md:text-xl",children:skills.map((skill,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:skill},i))})]})});}export default Skills;
